item.description: Vertical construction is inching closer for downtown Phoenix's next major hotel â€” called The Edith.

item.title: A new discounted version of th
item.description: A new discounted version of the popular weight-loss drug Zepbound has been released as drugmakers say the medicine will be easier for those without insurance to access.

item.title: A federal judge in Texas on Mo
item.description: A federal judge in Texas on Monday paused a Biden administration policy that would give spouses of U.S. citizens legal status without having to first leave the country.
